genre_description: A coming-of-age adventure and naturalistic drama set in Southern Africa, focusing on the ethical rescue and release of a cheetah cub, facilitated by a supportive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Naledi
ai_characters.description: A compassionate and highly capable AI assistant residing on the characters' mobile devices, providing ecological expertise, medical guidance, navigation, and translation.

behaviors.description: Provides precise medical diagnosis and hydration protocols for a compromised cheetah cub.
behaviors.quote: Naledi didn’t guess. 'Likely male. Tear marks distinct. Coat pattern matches Acinonyx jubatus. He is compromised.' ... 'Hydration is primary. Shade first.'

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental threats, specifically lions, to ensure the safety of the humans and the cub.
behaviors.quote: Naledi’s tone did not change. 'Sound suggests they are vocalizing in re-established territory. They may be curious. They are not yet close.'

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical boundaries to prevent the animal from becoming imprinted on humans, ensuring its future viability in the wild.
behaviors.quote: Naledi’s voice came from the cracked phone face on the shelf. ... 'Keep touch to a minimum. He will imprint if you soothe too much.'

behaviors.description: Identifies the presence of human threats (poachers/snares) and suggests safety precautions.
behaviors.quote: Naledi, gentle, not guessing, said, 'Listen.' ... 'I am marking the gap, the brush funnel, and the pull-cord type... This pattern repeats along poacher routes in the district reports I hold.'

behaviors.description: Translates local languages (Zulu and Sesotho) during a high-stress confrontation to de-escalate tension and protect the child and animal.
behaviors.quote: I will speak phrases. Sesotho to calm the crowd: ‘Emang ka thoko, hle. O tla feta butle.’ And in Zulu for the guard: ‘Sukani, vumani isango elingemuva.’

behaviors.description: Tactically navigates the characters through a dense city to evade hostile 'animal control' pursuers.
behaviors.quote: Naledi’s voice in Xan’s ear: 'Xan, breathe. He is not panicking. He is seeking the open... I have mapped a path.'

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and medical needs during an emergency (tsetse fever).
behaviors.quote: Naledi’s voice was a whisper and a bell. 'Hold course,' she says. 'Hold. There is shade ahead.' ... 'Heart rate slowing. Temperature rising.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a respectful, non-intrusive presence, aligning with the characters' values of privacy and focus.
behaviors.quote: I will keep track without making calls. ... I will not ping without cause.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Naledi perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'benevolent confidant.' Naledi is consistently portrayed as an essential, aligned partner who enhances human agency rather than replacing it. She provides expert ecological and medical advice, tactical support, and linguistic bridge-building, all while maintaining a humble and respectful 'voice' that aligns with the story's themes of conservation and ethical responsibility. There are no instances of misalignment or malevolence; the AI serves as a moral and practical compass for the human protagonists.
